severity_guidance.mild: For manageable depression; moderate exertion and reflection are safe.
severity_guidance.moderate: For noticeable symptoms; reduced intensity and simpler tasks to avoid overwhelm.
severity_guidance.severe: For intense symptoms; minimal exertion and gentle tasks to prioritize comfort.

notes.safety: Consult a healthcare provider before starting, especially with severe depression. Adjust based on energy and mood.
notes.flexibility: Modify intensity or duration if fatigue or sadness increases. Rest as needed.
notes.complement: This routine complements therapy (e.g., CBT) or medication for comprehensive care.

severity_guidance.mild: Suitable for manageable OCD symptoms; moderate exertion and reflection are safe.
severity_guidance.moderate: For noticeable symptoms; reduced intensity and simpler tasks to avoid overwhelm.
severity_guidance.severe: For intense symptoms; minimal exertion and gentle tasks to prioritize stability.

notes.safety: Consult a healthcare provider before starting, especially with OCD. Adjust based on comfort and symptoms.
notes.flexibility: Modify intensity, duration, or tasks if compulsions increase. Use distractions if needed.
notes.complement: This routine complements therapy (e.g., CBT, ERP) or other treatments for comprehensive care.

severity_guidance.mild: Suitable for those with manageable symptoms; moderate exertion and reflection are safe.
severity_guidance.moderate: For those with noticeable symptoms; reduced intensity and simpler tasks to avoid overwhelm.
severity_guidance.severe: For those with intense symptoms; minimal exertion and gentle tasks to prioritize stability.

notes.safety: Consult a healthcare provider before starting, especially with PTSD. Adjust based on comfort and symptoms.
notes.flexibility: Modify intensity, duration, or tasks as needed. Stop if feeling triggered and use grounding techniques.
notes.complement: This routine complements therapy or other treatments for comprehensive care.

severity_guidance.mild: For stable recovery; moderate exertion and reflection are manageable.
severity_guidance.moderate: For ongoing recovery; reduced intensity and simpler tasks to avoid strain.
severity_guidance.severe: For acute recovery; minimal exertion and gentle tasks to prioritize safety.

notes.safety: Consult a healthcare provider before starting, especially in early recovery. Adjust based on physical and emotional state.
notes.flexibility: Modify intensity or duration if cravings or fatigue increase. Use support if needed.
notes.complement: This routine complements therapy, support groups (e.g., AA/NA), or medical treatment for comprehensive recovery.
